name: The Weather Forecast
effectText: When this card is activated: You can place 1 "The Weather" Spell/Trap from your Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use each of the following effects of "The Weather Forecast" once per turn. If you Link Summon a "The Weather" Link Monster, you can also use face-up "The Weather" cards in your Spell & Trap Zone as "The Weather" monsters for its Link Summon. During your Main Phase, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "The Weather" monster from your hand. You can only activate 1 "The Weather Forecast" per turn.
